channel.title: Rs-Legends [REVAMPED] 718/737 Revision *ECONOMY / PK'ing* Server [RS Before EOC]
channel.description:
[center]718/737 Economy Pking Server
Webclient: Www.Rs-Legends.Com Forums: Www.Rs-Legends.Com
If you liked RS before EOC came and ruined the entire game, then you will absolutely LOVE Rs-Legends
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n7V2Yesn9SY[/youtube]
We have *ALL* of the newest items, "saradomin's whisper, bandos warshield, Etc." (So many more, just dont feel like writing them all down)
SOME SERVER MEDIA:
Server Home Area + Shop's [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z3B5l.png[/img]
Various Teleport's [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ug4sW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o1UBW.png[/img]
100% FULLY WORKING GWD! [ New Bosses & Item's ] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yvh4h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xiwQ0.png[/img]
100% FULLY WORKING KDB (King Black Dragon) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/thCNV.png[/img]
100% FULLY WORKING QBD (Queen Black Dragon) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xeDzB.png[/img]
VIEW OTHER PLAYER'S STATS! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z2kvz.png[/img]
Want to see more? come play now at Www.Rs-Legends.Com ![/center]
